global_flags.description: additional domains to allow for CORS [array] [default: []]
enable mDNS service discovery (defaults hostname to 0.0.0.0) [boolean] [default: false]
custom domain name for mDNS service (default: opencode.local) [string] [default: "opencode.local"]
model to use in the format of provider/model [string]

flags.description: additional domains to allow for CORS [array] [default: []]
enable mDNS service discovery (defaults hostname to 0.0.0.0) [boolean] [default: false]
custom domain name for mDNS service (default: opencode.local) [string] [default: "opencode.local"]
model to use in the format of provider/model [string]
directory path to generate the agent file [string]
comma-separated list of tools to enable (default: all). Available: "bash, read, write, edit, list, glob, grep, webfetch, task, todowrite, todoread" [string]

flags.description: GitHub mock event to run the agent for [string]

flags.description: refresh the models cache from models.dev [boolean]
use more verbose model output (includes metadata like costs) [boolean]

subcommands.name: pr
subcommands.description: fetch and checkout a GitHub PR branch, then run opencode

flags.description: attach to a running opencode server (e.g., http://localhost:4096) [string]
the command to run, use message for args [string]
format: default (formatted) or json (raw JSON events) [string] [choices: "default", "json"] [default: "default"]
model to use in the format of provider/model [string]
port for the local server (defaults to random port if no value provided)[number]
title for the session (uses truncated prompt if no value provided) [string]
model variant (provider-specific reasoning effort, e.g., high, max, minimal) [string]
additional domains to allow for CORS [array] [default: []]
enable mDNS service discovery (defaults hostname to 0.0.0.0) [boolean] [default: false]
custom domain name for mDNS service (default: opencode.local) [string] [default: "opencode.local"]
limit to N most recent sessions [number]

subcommands.name: stats
subcommands.description: show token usage and cost statistics

flags.description: show stats for the last N days (default: all time) [number]
show model statistics (default: hidden). Pass a number to show top N, otherwise shows all
filter by project (default: all projects, empty string: current project)[string]
number of tools to show (default: all) [number]

subcommands.name: uninstall
subcommands.description: uninstall opencode and remove all related files

flags.description: show what would be removed without removing [boolean] [default: false]
keep session data and snapshots [boolean] [default: false]

subcommands.name: upgrade
subcommands.description: upgrade opencode to the latest or a specific version

subcommands.name: web
subcommands.description: start opencode server and open web interface
